author: lehors
msg: removed old code left over in previous commit

author: andyc
msg: 1) Implemented ability to scan TextDecl line of external entities.
2) Fixed debug printing code in entity manager so that it won't
throw a NullPointerException on the last endEntity -- THIS ONLY
AFFECTS THE PARSER WHEN DEBUGGING IS TURNED ON AND COMPILED INTO

author: andyc
msg: Changed the document scanner to consume the closing ']' to
end the internal subset of the DTD. The DTD scanner should
stick to parsing when it knows, the declarations, and NOT
consume things that are outside that scope.
I also added a TextDecl state to handle external general
entities. Next, I'll be adding the code to actually parse

author: lehors
msg: added a startPE method that deals with scanning the textdecl
When scanning the internal subset we now stop before the ending ]
which is left to the document scanner to consume.
